attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Like many young families, we earn not enough to be comfortable, but too much to get any help in terms of tax credits etc. The only help we get is through childcare vouchers, which surprise, surprise, GB wants to scrap because it's too much of a benefit for 'higher tax payers'. Why are we always the target market for higher tax etc? Why are we always penalised? We work hard, long hours to try and better our life for us and our 15 month old daughter. I sometimes wonder why we bothered to get our degrees and jobs, when others who didn't, seem to be better off. Leave us alone Gordon Brown. Go and pick on somebody else.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. You may need to make it more specific to a particular point about government policy before we can accept it.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
